DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Methods Strain Perioperative Transesophageal Echo CABG : An Observational Study
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct Department Anaesthesiology Intensive Care , Advanced Cardiac Centre , Post Graduate Institute Medical Education Research , Chandigarh obtain institutional ethical committee clearance . Fifty patient schedule coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) include study . An informed write consent take patient . Anaesthesia technique All patient examine day prior surgery . Baseline data include preoperative physical status , haemogram , biochemistry , preoperative transthoracic echocardiography coronary angiography data note . A standard anaesthesia technique use patient . Inside operating room , electrocardiography ( ECG ) , pulse oximetry noninvasive blood pressure ( NIBP ) apply . Anaesthesia induce fentanyl 5 - 10 Âµg/kg/ body weight propofol titrate loss response verbal command followed endotracheal intubation facilitate vecuronium 0.1mg/kg . A 20 gauge arterial catheter insert leave radial artery right internal jugular vein cannulate triple lumen catheter central venous access pulmonary artery catheter haemodynamic assessment . A baseline transthoracic echocardiogram perform induction general anaesthesia . After induction general anaesthesia , TEE probe ( GE Medical Systems , Horten , Norway ) introduce . Anaesthesia maintain isoflurane , intravenous morphine ( intermittent bolus ; total 0.5 mg/kg surgery ) vecuronium bolus . All patient undergo CABG cardiopulmonary bypass ( CPB ) support . Total cardiopulmonary bypass time Aortic cross clamp time note . Patients shift cardiac surgical intensive care unit ( ICU ) electively ventilate . Decision extubation inotrope support leave attend intensivist . Echocardiography data After induction general anaesthesia , comprehensive transesophageal echocardiogram perform use probe GE vivid E9 echocardiography system ( GE Medical Systems , Hortein , Norway ) patient . The following parameter note institute CPB wean CPB achievement stable haemodynamics : 1 . 2 dimensional Left ventricular ejection fraction use Simpson 's method midesophageal 4 chamber midesophageal 2 chamber view . 2 . 3 dimensional Left ventricular ejection fraction midesophageal 4 chamber midesophageal 2 chamber view . 3 . Doppler tissue image derive regional global longitudinal strain midesophageal 4 chamber , midesophageal 2 chamber midesophageal long axis view . 4 . Speckle track image derive regional global longitudinal strain midesophageal 4 chamber , midesophageal 2 chamber midesophageal long axis view . An average 3 reading 3 different cardiac cycle use parameter .
